select.name: SelecttblFixedAssetAdd1
select.defineSQL: select tblFixedAssetAdd.id f1, tblFixedAssetAdd.originalWorth f2, tblFixedAssetAdd.GoodsNumber f3, tblFixedAssetAdd.GoodsName f4, tblFixedAssetAdd.GoodsSpec f5 from tblFixedAssetAdd
select.changeCond: (tblFixedAssetAdd.statusId!='-1' and tblFixedAssetAdd.id not in (select AssetsAddId from tblFixedAssetClean WHERE workFlowNodeName='finish') and (tblFixedAssetAdd.id in (select AssetsAddId from tblFixedAssetDepreciate where tblFixedAssetDepreciate.Period=@Sess:NowPeriod and tblFixedAssetDepreciate.PeriodYear=@Sess:NowYear and tblFixedAssetDepreciate.statusId=1) or len(isnull(tblFixedAssetAdd.referDeprecia,''))!=0))
